time_to_first_token.description: Time to generate the first token (TTFT).

normalized_time_per_output_token.description: Typical time to generate an output token, including first (NTPOT).

time_per_output_token.description: Time to generate an output token, excluding first (TPOT, may differ from ITL depending on tool).

inter_token_latency.description: Latency between generated tokens, excluding first (ITL, may differ from TPOT depending on tool).

failures.description: Number of requests which responded with an error.
failures.title: Failures

incomplete.description: Number of requests which were not completed.
incomplete.title: Incomplete

standardized.description: Component configuration details in standardized format.
standardized.title: Standardized

ComponentHealth.description: Health and reliability metrics for a component during the benchmark.

component_label.description: References the component's label from scenario.stack[].metadata.label
component_label.title: Component Label

total_restarts.description: Total restarts across all replicas during benchmark.
total_restarts.title: Total Restarts

failed_replicas.description: Number of replicas that hand one or more failures during benchmark.
failed_replicas.title: Failed Replicas

ComponentHealth.title: ComponentHealth

label.description: Unique name for this particular component.
label.title: Label

cfg_id.description: Configuration ID, a hash of this component's configuration.
cfg_id.title: Cfg Id

Distribution.description:
Distribution type.

Attributes
    FIXED: str
        Length is a fixed value.
    GAUSSIAN: str
        Gaussian distribution, with a mean and standard deviation.
    UNIFORM: str
        Uniform distribution between a minimum and maximum value.
    OTHER: str
        An otherwise undefined distribution.
Distribution.title: Distribution

Generic.description:
Component configuration for a generic component.

This class  allows for extra attributes to be added without validation.
Use this for development of new component classes, or when a class for your
component does not exist but you don't want to write your own class.

tool.description: Particular tool used for this component.
tool.title: Tool

Generic.title: Generic

HostType.description:
Enumeration of supported workload generators

Attributes
    REPLICA: str
        Standard instance of an inference service
    PREFILL: str
        Prefill instance of an inference service
    DECODE: str
        Decode instance of an inference service
HostType.title: HostType

InferenceEngine.description: Component configuration for an inference engine.

tool.description: Particular tool used for this component.
tool.title: Tool

InferenceEngine.title: InferenceEngine

dp_local.description: Local data parallelism for this engine instance.
dp_local.title: Dp Local

cfg_id.description: Configuration ID, a hash of the workload configuration.
cfg_id.title: Cfg Id

LoadNative.description: Workload generator configuration in native format.
LoadNative.title: LoadNative

num_groups.description: Number of groups of "users" that share common prefixes.
num_groups.title: Num Groups

num_prefixes.description: Number of common prefixes within a group.
num_prefixes.title: Num Prefixes

LoadSource.description:
How input tokens are generated.

Attributes
    RANDOM: str
        Tokens are randomly generated from vocabulary.
    SAMPLED: str
        Tokens are sampled from some data.
    UNKNOWN: str
        The source of tokens used is unknown.
LoadSource.title: LoadSource

rate_qps.description: Request rate, in queries per second.
rate_qps.title: Rate Qps

LoadStandardized.title: LoadStandardized

max_turns.description: Maximum number of requests per session.

replica_id.description: Unique identifier for this replica (e.g., pod name).
replica_id.title: Replica Id

restarts.description: Number of times this replica restarted during the benchmark.
restarts.title: Restarts

healthy.description: Healthy status at completion of benchmark.
healthy.title: Healthy

logs.description: Reference to logs for this specific replica.
logs.title: Logs

ReplicaHealth.title: ReplicaHealth

component_health.description: Component health and reliability metrics during benchmark.
component_health.title: Component Health

uid.description: Unique ID for this specific benchmark report.
uid.title: Uid

eid.description: Experiment ID, common across benchmark reports from a particular experiment.
eid.title: Eid

cid.description: Cluster ID, unique to a particular cluster.
cid.title: Cid

pid.description: Pod ID, unique to a workload generating and/or data collecting pod.
pid.title: Pid

stack.description: List of components used to build the stack.

normalized_time_per_output_token.description: Typical time to generate an output token, including first (NTPOT).

time_per_output_token.description: Time to generate an output token, excluding first (TPOT, may differ from ITL depending on tool).

inter_token_latency.description: Latency between generated tokens, excluding first (ITL, may differ from TPOT depending on tool).

Units.description:
Enumeration of units

Attributes
    COUNT: str
        Count
    MS: str
        Milliseconds
    S: str
        Seconds
    MB: str
        Megabytes
    GB: str
        Gigabytes
    TB: str
        Terabytes
    MIB: str
        Mebibytes
    GIB: str
        Gibibytes
    TIB: str
        Tebibytes
    MBIT_PER_S: str
        Megabbits per second
    GBIT_PER_S: str
        Gigabits per second
    TBIT_PER_S: str
        Terabits per second
    MB_PER_S: str
        Megabytes per second
    GB_PER_S: str
        Gigabytes per second
    TB_PER_S: str
        Terabytes per second
    GIB_PER_S: str
        GiB per second
    MS_PER_TOKEN: str
        Milliseconds per token
    S_PER_TOKEN: str
        Seconds per token
    TOKEN_PER_S: str
        Tokens per second
    WATTS: str
        Watts
Units.title: Units
